name: wanderlust-server
description: - Create a Web Server using Express - Create a Country List Object    ``` javascript  // for example const countries = [{id: 1, country: 'India', city: 'Jaipur'},{id: 2, country: 'Costa Rica', city: 'San Jose'}] ``` - Expose endpoints   - '/' for Wanderlust Hompage   - '/countries' to expose countries object
